name: ArtlessEdit
tagline: An artless editor for OS X bringing Ace to your desktop
body:
# ArtlessEdit

An artless editor for OS X bringing Ace to your desktop.

Download latest build:

[![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/0x4a616e/ArtlessEdit/master/ArtlessEdit/Images.xcassets/AppIcon.appiconset/icon_64x64.png)](https://github.com/0x4a616e/ArtlessEdit/releases)

ArtlessEdit allows you to user the beautiful Ace editor with the look and feel of a native OS X application.

![Screenshot](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/0x4a616e/ArtlessEdit/master/ArtlessEdit/artlessedit.png)

In addition to the rich feature set of Ace, ArtlessEdit brings you:

 * Quickly search through your recently opened files
 * Browse your recent file versions using eclipse-like fuzzy matching
 * Configure the look and feel separately by language
 * Navigate your files using exuberant ctags
 * Paste from your pasteboard history

For a complete list of features, check out [ace](http://ace.c9.io/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
